syms x
eqn = 0.0028*(exp(2*0.2*96485.3329*(x + 1.517)/(8.314*295)) - exp(-2*0.16*96485.3329*(x + 1.517)/(8.314*295))) - 0.0028*exp(-(x + 0.595)/4237.2881)/((0.0028/0.00867)*exp(-(x + 0.595)/4237.2881) + 1) == 0.018*10
solve(eqn, x)

ans =
    -1.251645284063062076571090421185

iMg = 0.0028*(exp(2*0.2*96485.3329*(x + 1.517)/(8.314*295)) - exp(-2*0.16*96485.3329*(x + 1.517)/(8.314*295)))
ans =
    0.182116725698300

iAl = 0.182116725698300
